name: DozeSounds
0:
”Alexa open Doze Sounds”
”Alexa ask Doze Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: doze sounds
des:
Specifically curated to help you fall asleep, this skill features a mix of soft, soothing sounds designed to lull the listener into a deep, restful sleep. It includes gentle melodies and other calming sounds.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Doze Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
